metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40516 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
WeeChat before 3.2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(crash) via a crafted WebSocket frame that trigger an out-of-bounds read inplugins/relay/relay-websocket.c in the Relay plugin.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-core - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-curses - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
weechat-plugins - 1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: weechat package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1ubuntu1+esm1').
